name: Magnet Music
description:
This is a 2 player game.

Player 1 should use the ASD keys, Player 2 should use the JKL keys to control magnets to sling a ball around the screen and build a song. Song bars must be hit in the correct order to activate.

This game was made for Code Liberation & Microsoft Women's History Month LadyJam in March 2015.

Roles were a little more blurred than the following suggests, but this is a close approximation.

Code: @edbles

Graphics: Mubinya Casey

Level & Game Design: Benny Ng

Audio: Arielle Martinez
